summary: A film about heavy music in the modern American South, as told by the very people who have created this music during the last two decades. Shot in back alleys, parking lots, and the seedy ... See full summary Â»
cast: Brent Anderson|Scott Angelacos|Phil Anselmo|Jonathan Athon|Alix Betroaich|Randy Blythe|Mike Boone|Jimmy Bower|Steve Brooks|Jerry Brown|Jonah Citty|Dave Collins|Phillip Cope|Sammy Duet|Chuck Ember|Ben Falgoust II|Andrew Fidler|Will Fiore|Kirk Fisher|Mike Floyd|Stevie Floyd|Rocky Gray|Harden Harrison|Zack Hembree|Ben Hogg|Chris Holcombe|Pepper Keenan|Erik Larson|Trinidad Leal|Edgar Livengood|Gary Mader|Joel Martin|James May|Troy Medlin|Mark Moody|Vaughn Moody|Mike Morowitz|Mark Morton|Shane Newsham|Brian Patton|Laura Pleasants|Noah Ray|Beer Reebs|Theron Rhoten|Jason Richardson|Dan Scanlan|Chuck Schaaf|Phillip Schaaf|Rob Shaffer|Josh Sharp|Jason Shi|Christian Sweeney|Gazelle Amber Valentine|Patrick Ware|Paul Webb|Hank Williams III|Hank Williams|Mike Ix Williams
title: Slow Southern Steel
